title: 2 Weeks After Trump Talks, Russia Bombards Kyiv, Killing at Least 18
description: The strikes, which hit a five-story apartment building, a shopping mall and buildings used by European governments, were the largest on the Ukrainian capital since the Alaska summit.
body: The strikes, which hit a five-story apartment building, a shopping mall and buildings used by European governments, were the largest on the Ukrainian capital since the Alaska summit.

title: Kim Jong-un and Putin Top List of U.S. Rivals Convening in Beijing Next Week
description: They will join China’s leader, Xi Jinping, and about 20 other heads of state, some of whom share a strong distrust of the United States.
body: They will join China’s leader, Xi Jinping, and about 20 other heads of state, some of whom share a strong distrust of the United States.

title: Jimmy Lai’s Freedom May Now Hinge on Beijing and Trump
description: As the outspoken Hong Kong publisher awaits a verdict, his trial has become a test of China’s resolve to crush dissent, and of whether President Trump can free him.
body: As the outspoken Hong Kong publisher awaits a verdict, his trial has become a test of China’s resolve to crush dissent, and of whether President Trump can free him.

title: A Gaza City Neighborhood Is Now a Wasteland, Satellite Images Show
description: With Israel’s expanded assault looming, Zeitoun already resembles other parts of Gaza that have been largely flattened in the war.
body: With Israel’s expanded assault looming, Zeitoun already resembles other parts of Gaza that have been largely flattened in the war.

title: U.N. Votes to Withdraw Peacekeepers From Lebanon Over Next Two Years
description: With the decades-old peacekeeping mission set to expire, the U.N. Security Council chose to extend it through 2026, then gradually withdraw the forces the following year.
body: With the decades-old peacekeeping mission set to expire, the U.N. Security Council chose to extend it through 2026, then gradually withdraw the forces the following year.

title: What to Know About Jimmy Lai’s Trial in Hong Kong
description: The media tycoon, jailed since 2020, ran a now-defunct newspaper that was critical of the government.
body: The media tycoon, jailed since 2020, ran a now-defunct newspaper that was critical of the government.

title: Fishermen Pulled In an Orange Shark Off Costa Rica: ‘My God, What Is This?’
description: Scientists published a study this month on the nurse shark, which was caught and photographed by sport fishermen last year.
body: Scientists published a study this month on the nurse shark, which was caught and photographed by sport fishermen last year.
